snippet: The American elite loves to rationalize soaring levels of inequality. But the task of achieving a fairer society with more equality of opportunity is, though difficult, within reach.
abstract: The American elite loves to rationalize soaring levels of inequality. But the task of achieving a fairer society with more equality of opportunity is, though difficult, within reach.

headline.main: Singapore’s Lessons for an Unequal America
headline.print_headline: Singapore’s Lessons for an Unequal America
